section.heading: Accounts and transfers nontestamentary.
section.text: A transfer resulting from the application of section 19-602.12 is effective by reason of the terms of the account involved and this subchapter and is not testamentary or subject to estate administration.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 214 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
